comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Not from Government House, but a building at the corner of Bent and Macquarie Streets - later (1891) the Australian Club.  Or possibly the top of the (old) Public Library.

Compare with earlier Henry King (different gates) - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2363484492/]

And later Charles Kerry (with 1893 Garden Island sheerlegs) - 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/2555447278/]

It was a popular view with photographers - right out through the Heads.

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Ah - cheers Beachcomber! Jørn Utzon must have had access to our wonderful Hungerford album :)
